summary: This is a search and seizure warrant authorizing the search of Little Saint James Island in the U.S. Virgin Islands on July 24, 2019. The warrant commands law enforcement to search for and seize property, including electronic devices and records, related to violations of federal law.

events.title: Search of Little Saint James Island
events.description: A search and seizure warrant is executed at Little Saint James Island, authorizing law enforcement to search for and seize property including electronic devices and records related to federal law violations.

locations: Little Saint James Island, U.S. Virgin Islands
keyFacts: A federal search warrant was issued for Little Saint James Island on July 24, 2019.
The warrant authorized seizure of electronic devices, records, and other property related to federal law violations.
The search was to be conducted during daytime hours (6:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.).
The document references violations of U.S. Code Title 18, Section 2251 and Section 2252, which relate to sexual exploitation of children and related activities.
This appears to be part of the post-arrest investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's activities.
